replays_button_default_tooltip_download: Click here to download the Replay for this match. Replays will also be available for download on Match History until the next patch.
replays_button_default_tooltip_error: There was an error with your download.
replays_button_default_tooltip_found: Replay found, queuing up for download.
replays_button_default_tooltip_missing_o: There was an error with your download.
replays_button_default_tooltip_retry_dow: There was an error with your download. Click here to try again.
replays_button_default_tooltip_lost: The replay for this game is missing and isn't available.
replays_button_default_tooltip_watch: Click here to watch your Replay
replays_button_default_tooltip_unsupport: Replays are unsupported for this game mode
replays_button_eog_tooltip_checking: Checking for replay availability. This could take up to a minute. You can also visit Match History to find Replays from this patch.
replays_button_eog_tooltip_download: Click here to download the Replay for this match. Replays will also be available for download from Match History until the next patch.
replays_button_tooltip_watch_disabled_pa: You are currently patching. Please wait until patching is finished to watch your replay.
replays_button_tooltip_watch_disabled_in: Replays are disabled while waiting for a match in Clash.
replays_button_tooltip_watch_disabled_pl: A game is still in progress. Replays are disabled while playing a game.
You are currently watching a replay. Only one replay can be watched at a time.
replays_button_tooltip_download_disabled: You are currently patching. Downloads are unavailable while patching.
replays_button_eog_first_time_tip: Click here to download the Replay for this match. Replays will also be available for download on Match History until the next patch.
